about_the_game:
Hook into an intergalactic adventure with Scark'Tee, a fearless Naal.

This 3D platformer game based on hook physics offers a wild experience of speed and skill for players seeking a challenge, while providing free-roaming mechanics to discover the secrets of Naltiune as you improve the environment around you.

Latch onto an intergalactic adventure with Scark'Tee, a fearless Naals, and uncover the secrets of Naltiune, an inhospitable moon on the planet Aqueora, inhabited solely by the agile Naals. With his long tail, Scark'Tee swings, fights, and slide through dangerous environments, helping his friends and facing unique challenges.

Discover how the Naals lived alongside Tee years before meeting Kadiha and her crew to embark on the grand journey of his life.

Learn to use your tail

Move yourself freely hanging around with your tail like a real naals

Destroy things and defend yourself from the Naltiune wildness

Interact with other characters and help them with their problems

Slide by branches, jump between them and reach the highest speed

Hang on animals that you need to complete your challenges

Pick objects and avoid obstacles by tubes and opened trunks

Key Features

Explore the world of Naltiune

Uncover unique and perilous landscapes that only the Naals have managed to inhabit for thousands of years.

Master your long tail

With Scark'Tee's versatile tail, hook and sway to maneuver through the environment, attack enemies, hang onto other animals, and slide through interior tubes.

Help your friends

Encounter and assist other Naals on your journey, each with special abilities that will aid you in your quest.

Face challenges

Overcome obstacles and unique enemies lurking in Naltiune, from wild creatures to deadly traps.

Captivating story

Immerse yourself in an exciting narrative as you uncover the secrets of Naltiune and fight for the survival of the Naals.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 64 bits
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 1050 GT
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: 64 bits
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 2050 RTX
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires an Apple processor
  • Processor: Apple M1
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 1050 GT
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires an Apple processor
  • Processor: Apple M1
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 2050 RTX
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Hook into a physical platforming adventure with Scark'Tee, a fearless Naal who dwells on the inhospitable moon of Naltiune. With his long tail, Scark'Tee swings, fights, and slides through perilous environments, helping his friends and facing unique challenges.
